Name: Bandage
Text: Heal 3.

Name: Blessed Healing
Text: Heal [INT] + 2. Exile this card.

Name: Cleanse
Text: Remove all effects on any target

Name: To the Front
Text: Up to two Allies gain Frontline

Name: Priority Healing
Text: Heal an ally with  Frontline [INT] * 2. Exile this card.

Name: Quick Bandages
Text: Heal 2. If this card is discarded to a basic action, the acting character heals 2.

Name: Empower
Text: Target ally gains +1[ INT], +1 [STR], and +1 [SPD] until the end of your next turn.

Name: Recall
Text: Return two cards from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Swords of the Past
Text: Deal X damage where X is the number of Cleric cards in your discard pile.

Name: Bubble shield
Text: Prevent the next damage that would be dealt to target ally. Draw a card.

Name: Tough Skin
Text: Prevent the first damage dealt to target ally each turn. Discard this card at the start of that character's next turn.

Name: Mass Cleanse
Text: Remove all effects from all characters.

Name: Cracked Armor
Text: The next time target foe takes damage, they take double that damage instead.

Name: Revive
Text: Revive a downed ally. They have [INT] health.

Name: Blood for Power
Text: Until this character's next turn, when they take damage, they generate mana equal to the damage taken.

Name: Halo's Brightness
Text: Deal [INT] damage to each foe

Name: Slam
Text: Deal [STR] + 2 damage

Name: Lunge
Text: Deal [STR] * 2 damage. Lose 1 [STR] until the end of this character's next turn.

Name: Battle Surge
Text: Deal [STR] + 3 damage. This character is not unexhausted the next time your team unexhausts.

Name: Daze
Text: Deal 2 damage. The damaged foe is exhausted.

Name: Slice open
Text: Deal 2 damage. The damaged foe cannot be healed until this character's next turn.

Name: Trained Blow
Text: This character's next basic attack this turn deals double damage.

Name: Strength Flare
Text: Gain 2 [STR] until end of turn.

Name: Knockout Punch
Text: Target foe cannot unexhaust until this character is unexhausted.

Name: Sweeping Blow
Text: This character's next basic attack this turn can distribute the damage between two targets.

Name: Defend
Text: Gain frontline. Draw a card.

Name: Wild Blow
Text: You may discard any number of cards as an additional cost to this character's next basic attack this turn. Deal +1 damage for each card discarded this way.

Name: Chivalry
Text: During each of this character's turns, they gain frontline until they take damage.

Name: Blood Aura
Text: Until this character is unexhausted, foes cannot be healed.

Name: Flurry of Blows
Text: This character may basic attack without discarding cards this turn.

Name: Combo Attack
Text: Exhaust an ally Fighter. If you do, deal [STR] + 3 damage.

Name: Ready for it
Text: As long as you have frontline, reduce damage taken by 1.

Name: Kit
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Critical Finisher
Text: Deal X damage where X is the number of Rogue cards that have been played this turn.

Name: Blurred Hands
Text: This turn, you may take actions as though their action cost were reduced by 1.

Name: Like the Lightning
Text: Deal [SPD] damage.

Name: Speed Flare
Text: Gain 2 [SPD] until the end of this character's next turn.

Name: Thousand Strike Attack
Text: Deal 2 damage 3 times.

Name: Lock In
Text: Each time a foe takes damage this turn, they take that damage + 1 instead.

Name: Distracting Shot
Text: Exile a rogue card from your hand. At the end of this character's next turn, play that card for free.

Name: Shadow Clone
Text: Exile the first card played on each of this character's turns. At the end of each turn, play each card exiled this way this turn.

Name: Caltrops
Text: Each time you play a rogue card this turn, deal 1 damage to each foe.

Name: Hidden Dagger
Text: Deal 2 damage. Draw a card.

Name: Spike Trap
Text: Play this card face down. The next time a foe takes a turn, they take 5 damage.

Name: Weakness Trap
Text: Play this card face down. The next time a foe takes a turn, they lose 2 [STR] and 2 [INT] until the end of that turn.

Name: Memory trap
Text: Play this card face down. The next time a foe takes a turn, that player reveals their hand. You choose a card and they discard that card. Then they draw a card.

Name: Forget
Text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card revealed this way. They discard that card.

Name: Steal
Text: Deal 1 damage to each foe. For each foe damaged this way with half or less health, draw a card.

Name: Brain Blast
Text: Deal [INT] + 3 damage

Name: Charge
Text: Gain 4 mana

Name: Mega-charge
Text: Gain 8 mana

Name: Leyline connection
Text: When this character takes the Generate Mana basic action, gain [INT] +2 mana instead

Name: Wizard Time
Text: Immediately take another turn. Unexhaust all Wizards on your team.

Name: Freeze
Text: Target foe's [SPD] is reduced by 2 until your next turn.

Name: Think
Text: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

Name: Lesser Fireball
Text: Deal [INT] - 2 damage to each foe

Name: Greater Fireball
Text: Deal [INT] damage to each foe

Name: Mirrorcast
Text: The next card you play this turn is copied.

Name: Mana transfer
Text: Target Ally gains 3 mana. Draw a card.

Name: Intelligence Flare
Text: Gain 2 [INT] until end of turn

Name: Library Access
Text: Draw [INT] cards. Discard two.

Name: Possibility Storm
Text: Deal X damage where X is the number of cards in your hand.

Name: Greatest Fireball
Text: Deal 20 damage

Name: Animated Sword
Text: The first time you deal damage each turn, deal half that damage to another foe.
